name: Beavor's Infestation
description: Oh wow little critters are crawling into Beavor’s tree so now it wants to smash them with a big hammer. Run around with WASD or arrow keys and smash them with space, Z, or X and don’t let too many escape. Honestly not gonna lie this is definitely the most unbalanced bullshit game I’ve made yet but it’s funny so yah.
